creator: jim@riggs.me
text:
Created attachment 25430
Patch to fix handling of RemoteIPInternalProxy*

mod_remoteip does not currently flag proxies configured as internal properly.  The mconfig parameter of AP_INIT_* ends up in cmd->info, not the cfg parameter to func.  Patch attached.
Fixed in r1185828, thanks for the patch
creator: sf@sfritsch.de
